sentences.sentence: Objective To seek a therapeutic method of intractably therapeutic cervicitis.
sentences.translation: 目的寻求一种根治难治性宫颈炎的方法。

sentences.sentence: For a long time I could not understand how someone of his caliber could remain so intractably loyal to such an undeserving employer.
sentences.translation: 有很长时间我一直无法理解，为什么像他一样有能力的人长期忠诚于这般没有吸引力的职位。
